Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product not only offers exceptional value but also comes with a comprehensive warranty and customer support. Considering its unique features and benefits, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $7500. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to respond promptly if you're interested. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
